amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase funding for territorial assistance initiatives managed by the Interior Department by $5 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce funding for the Office of the Secretary Departmental Operations by 5 million and increase funding for the Insular Affair by a similar amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Sablan amendment (A019) Failed by recorded vote: 183 - 245 (Roll no. 395).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Sablan amendment (A019) Failed by recorded vote: 183 - 245 (Roll no. 395).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A019) offered by Mr. Sablan.
